reqsimile
Class Common

java.lang.Object
  reqsimile.Common
public final class Common
extends java.lang.Object

Contains generic functions that are used throughout the application.

Method Detail

getSqlFields

public static final java.lang.String getSqlFields(java.util.Collection c)
Creates a comma separated field list from the elements in a collection. Each field identifier is enclosed in brackets. The result may be used in SQL statements.

Parameters:
c - The collection containing field strings

toCollection

public static final java.util.Collection toCollection(java.lang.String collString)

Parameters:

Returns:
A collection

toArrayList

Parameters:
array - The native Java array
Returns:
An ArrayList

timeDiff

public static final java.lang.String timeDiff(long startTime)
Returns the time difference between a given time and the current system time. The result is returned as a string in natural language. Precision is on seconds only, as the accuracy is not very high.

Parameters:
startTime - The given time to which the difference to current time shall be given.
Returns:
The difference between current time and startTime in natural language.

public static int otherReqSet(int reqSet)
Returns the other available source requirements set id given a requirements set id

Parameters:
reqSet - A requirements set id
Returns:
The requirements set corresponding id to the given

Returns:
